citations.narrative:
At the time of inspection, it was noted that the records were incomplete. There was no record of animals on hand. The
Record of Animals on Hand is essential for proper identification of regulated animals at the inspection site. Every Dealer
shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the regulated animals on hand. Correct
by July 13, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.75(b)(2) 
   
Records: Dealers and exhibitors. 
At the time of inspection, it was noted that the records were incomplete. There was no record of animals on hand. The 
Record of Animals on Hand is essential for proper identification of regulated animals at the inspection site. Every Dealer 
shall make, keep, and maintain records or forms which fully and correctly disclose the regulated animals on hand. Correct 
by July 13, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
